value.name: Massive Oklahoma Manhunt Ends With Man Suspected In String Of Violent Crimes Dead
value.description: Authorities believe Michael Dale Vance Jr. posted two Facebook Live videos Oct. 24 documenting his run from police, although he had been silent since then. An Oklahoma state trooper shot and ...

value.name: Michael Vance
value.description: Police: Oklahoma Man Wanted For Violent ... counts of first-degree murder has been issued for 38-year-old Michael Dale Vance Jr. of Chandler, Oklahoma. He's been wanted for more than 24 hours.
